DOC.brief_title: A Trial Robotic-assisted Versus Laparoscopic Versus Open Abdominoperineal Resection Treating Low Rectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: Patients eligible inclusion primary tumor low rectal cancer . Eligible patient randomly assign robotic-assisted ( arm A ) versus laparoscopic ( arm B ) versus open abdominoperineal resection ( arm C ) .
